Highest graded example from the Wm. Blair & Co trade card issued to advertise the "Darktown Battery" Mechanical Bank.  $7500 or best offer.  Shipping will be $20.  For those who do not know me I sell under the ebay id roomn8.  Please email with questions.

Thanks,
Daniel
[URL="vintagesportscards@roomn8.com"]vintagesportscards@roomn8.com[/URL]
